              ["INDEX(y_id, x_id)", [["c"]]],
              [" – The "],
              ["PRIMARY KEY", [["c"]]],
              [
                " makes it efficient to go one direction; the makes the other direction efficient. No need to say "

              ["UNIQUE", [["c"]]],
